summary: This mod changes several shouts into new, better shouts.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes several less useful (in my humble opinion) shouts into new, better shouts.

Animal Allegiance ----> animal regeneration (heal)  (long cooldown, heals 100,150,500)

Aura Whisper  ----> Aura Bolt (Swift lightning attack) (short/medium cooldown, 15dmg,30dmg,50dmg)

Disarm ----> Invisibility (emergency stealth)  (long cooldown, 7 second stealth)

Dismay ----> Equilibrium shout  (medium cooldown, 90, 180, 250 equilibrium spell)

Kyne\'s peace ----> Kyne\'s candlelight  (medium/shot cooldown.  1min. light)

Throw voice ----> summon dragon priest (very long cooldown, 30 second dragon priest)

whirlwind sprint timer reduced.  (to 5, 15, 20 seconds)







I find this mod adds useful utility to my characters, and I hope a few other people might enjoy this as well.






be sure to check out my other game-balancing mods!


http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1851982
author: jmanoray
